metadata.title: CVE-2020-12362 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the firmware for some Intel(R) Graphics Drivers forWindows * before version 26.20.100.7212 and before Linux kernel version 5.5may allow a privileged user to potentially enable an escalation ofprivilege via local access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
